original_text: You are free to eat any kind of food. You understand that. But other Christians do not understand so well. So you must be careful. Do not cause them to do something that they think is wrong.
korean_text: 그런즉 너희의 자유가 믿음이 약한 자들에게 걸려 넘어지게 하는 것이 되지 않도록 조심하라

sentences.original_text: You are free to eat any kind of food.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 어떤 종류의 음식이든 먹을 자유가 있다.

sentences.original_text: But other Christians do not understand so well.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 그리스도인들은 그렇게 잘 이해하지 못한다.

sentences.original_text: Do not cause them to do something
